markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Poison Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=96) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 77 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48) (Level 4), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 4)

</column>

---

Your body has become fortified against toxins. You gain poison resistance equal to half your level, and you gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against poisons.
name: Poison Resistance
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 77 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Repeated exposure to toxic reagents has fortified your body against poisons of all kinds.
</summary>
summary: Repeated exposure to toxic reagents has fortified your body against poisons of all kinds.
